entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
